00060 class filter: internal::no_copy {
00061 private:
00063     static filter* not_in_pipeline() {return reinterpret_cast<filter*>(intptr_t(-1));}
00064     
00066     static const unsigned char filter_is_serial = 0x1; 
00067 
00069 
00071     static const unsigned char filter_is_out_of_order = 0x1<<4;  
00072 
00074     static const unsigned char filter_is_bound = 0x1<<5;  
00075 
00076     static const unsigned char current_version = __TBB_PIPELINE_VERSION(5);
00077     static const unsigned char version_mask = 0x7<<1; // bits 1-3 are for version
00078 public:
00079     enum mode {
00081         parallel = current_version | filter_is_out_of_order, 
00083         serial_in_order = current_version | filter_is_serial,
00085         serial_out_of_order = current_version | filter_is_serial | filter_is_out_of_order,
00087         serial = serial_in_order
00088     };
00089 protected:
00090     filter( bool is_serial_ ) : 
00091         next_filter_in_pipeline(not_in_pipeline()),
00092         my_input_buffer(NULL),
00093         my_filter_mode(static_cast<unsigned char>(is_serial_ ? serial : parallel)),
00094         prev_filter_in_pipeline(not_in_pipeline()),
00095         my_pipeline(NULL),
00096         next_segment(NULL)
00097     {}
00098     
00099     filter( mode filter_mode ) :
00100         next_filter_in_pipeline(not_in_pipeline()),
00101         my_input_buffer(NULL),
00102         my_filter_mode(static_cast<unsigned char>(filter_mode)),
00103         prev_filter_in_pipeline(not_in_pipeline()),
00104         my_pipeline(NULL),
00105         next_segment(NULL)
00106     {}
00107 
00108 public:
00110     bool is_serial() const {
00111         return bool( my_filter_mode & filter_is_serial );
00112     }  
00113     
00115     bool is_ordered() const {
00116         return (my_filter_mode & (filter_is_out_of_order|filter_is_serial))==filter_is_serial;
00117     }
00118 
00120     bool is_bound() const {
00121         return ( my_filter_mode & filter_is_bound )==filter_is_bound;
00122     }
00123 
00125 
00126     virtual void* operator()( void* item ) = 0;
00127 
00129 
00130     virtual __TBB_EXPORTED_METHOD ~filter();
00131 
00132 #if __TBB_TASK_GROUP_CONTEXT
00134 
00136     virtual void finalize( void* /*item*/ ) {};
00137 #endif
00138 
00139 private:
00141     filter* next_filter_in_pipeline;
00142 
00144 
00145     internal::input_buffer* my_input_buffer;
00146 
00147     friend class internal::stage_task;
00148     friend class internal::pipeline_root_task;
00149     friend class pipeline;
00150     friend class thread_bound_filter;
00151 
00153     const unsigned char my_filter_mode;
00154 
00156     filter* prev_filter_in_pipeline;
00157 
00159     pipeline* my_pipeline;
00160 
00162 
00163     filter* next_segment;
00164 };
00165

00168 class thread_bound_filter: public filter {
00169 public:
00170     enum result_type {
00171         // item was processed
00172         success,
00173         // item is currently not available
00174         item_not_available,
00175         // there are no more items to process
00176         end_of_stream
00177     };
00178 protected:
00179     thread_bound_filter(mode filter_mode): 
00180          filter(static_cast<mode>(filter_mode | filter::filter_is_bound))
00181     {}
00182 public:
00184 
00189     result_type __TBB_EXPORTED_METHOD try_process_item(); 
00190 
00192 
00196     result_type __TBB_EXPORTED_METHOD process_item();
00197 
00198 private:
00200     result_type internal_process_item(bool is_blocking);
00201 };

00206 public:
00208     __TBB_EXPORTED_METHOD pipeline();
00209 
00212     virtual __TBB_EXPORTED_METHOD ~pipeline();
00213 
00215     void __TBB_EXPORTED_METHOD add_filter( filter& filter_ );
00216 
00218     void __TBB_EXPORTED_METHOD run( size_t max_number_of_live_tokens );
00219 
00220 #if __TBB_TASK_GROUP_CONTEXT
00222     void __TBB_EXPORTED_METHOD run( size_t max_number_of_live_tokens, tbb::task_group_context& context );
00223 #endif
00224 
00226     void __TBB_EXPORTED_METHOD clear();
00227 
00228 private:
00229     friend class internal::stage_task;
00230     friend class internal::pipeline_root_task;
00231     friend class filter;
00232     friend class thread_bound_filter;
00233     friend class internal::pipeline_cleaner;
00234     friend class tbb::interface5::internal::pipeline_proxy;
00235

00238

00241

00244

00247

00250

00253 
00255     bool has_thread_bound_filters;
00256 
00258     void remove_filter( filter& filter_ );
00259 
00261     void __TBB_EXPORTED_METHOD inject_token( task& self );
00262 
00263 #if __TBB_TASK_GROUP_CONTEXT
00265     void clear_filters();
00266 #endif
00267 };

00278 
00279 class flow_control {
00280     bool is_pipeline_stopped;
00281     flow_control() { is_pipeline_stopped = false; }
00282     template<typename T, typename U, typename Body> friend class internal::concrete_filter;
00283 public:
00284     void stop() { is_pipeline_stopped = true; }
00285 };
00286 
00288 namespace internal {
00289 
00290 template<typename T, typename U, typename Body>
00291 class concrete_filter: public tbb::filter {
00292     Body my_body;
00293 
00294     /*override*/ void* operator()(void* input) {
00295         T* temp_input = (T*)input;
00296         // Call user's operator()() here
00297         void* output = (void*) new U(my_body(*temp_input)); 
00298         delete temp_input;
00299         return output;
00300     }
00301 
00302 public:
00303     concrete_filter(tbb::filter::mode filter_mode, const Body& body) : filter(filter_mode), my_body(body) {}
00304 };
00305 
00306 template<typename U, typename Body>
00307 class concrete_filter<void,U,Body>: public filter {
00308     Body my_body;
00309 
00310     /*override*/void* operator()(void*) {
00311         flow_control control;
00312         U temp_output = my_body(control);
00313         void* output = control.is_pipeline_stopped ? NULL : (void*) new U(temp_output); 
00314         return output;
00315     }
00316 public:
00317     concrete_filter(tbb::filter::mode filter_mode, const Body& body) : filter(filter_mode), my_body(body) {}
00318 };
00319 
00320 template<typename T, typename Body>
00321 class concrete_filter<T,void,Body>: public filter {
00322     Body my_body;
00323    
00324     /*override*/ void* operator()(void* input) {
00325         T* temp_input = (T*)input;
00326         my_body(*temp_input);
00327         delete temp_input;
00328         return NULL;
00329     }
00330 public:
00331     concrete_filter(tbb::filter::mode filter_mode, const Body& body) : filter(filter_mode), my_body(body) {}
00332 };
00333 
00334 template<typename Body>
00335 class concrete_filter<void,void,Body>: public filter {
00336     Body my_body;
00337     
00339     /*override*/ void* operator()(void*) {
00340         flow_control control;
00341         my_body(control);
00342         void* output = control.is_pipeline_stopped ? NULL : (void*)(intptr_t)-1; 
00343         return output;
00344     }
00345 public:
00346     concrete_filter(filter::mode filter_mode, const Body& body) : filter(filter_mode), my_body(body) {}
00347 };
00348 
00350 
00351 class pipeline_proxy {
00352     tbb::pipeline my_pipe;
00353 public:
00354     pipeline_proxy( const filter_t<void,void>& filter_chain );
00355     ~pipeline_proxy() {
00356         while( filter* f = my_pipe.filter_list ) 
00357             delete f; // filter destructor removes it from the pipeline
00358     }
00359     tbb::pipeline* operator->() { return &my_pipe; }
00360 };
00361 
00363 
00364 class filter_node: tbb::internal::no_copy {
00366     tbb::atomic<intptr_t> ref_count;
00367 protected:
00368     filter_node() {
00369         ref_count=1;
00370     }
00371 public:
00373     virtual void add_to( pipeline& ) = 0;
00375     void add_ref() {++ref_count;}
00377     void remove_ref() {
00378         __TBB_ASSERT(ref_count>0,"ref_count underflow");
00379         if( --ref_count==0 ) 
00380             delete this;
00381     }
00382     virtual ~filter_node() {}
00383 };
00384 
00386 template<typename T, typename U, typename Body>
00387 class filter_node_leaf: public filter_node  {
00388     const tbb::filter::mode mode;
00389     const Body& body;
00390     /*override*/void add_to( pipeline& p ) {
00391         concrete_filter<T,U,Body>* f = new concrete_filter<T,U,Body>(mode,body);
00392         p.add_filter( *f );
00393     }
00394 public:
00395     filter_node_leaf( tbb::filter::mode m, const Body& b ) : mode(m), body(b) {}
00396 };
00397 
00399 class filter_node_join: public filter_node {
00400     filter_node& left;
00401     filter_node& right;
00402     /*override*/~filter_node_join() {
00403        left.remove_ref();
00404        right.remove_ref();
00405     }
00406     /*override*/void add_to( pipeline& p ) {
00407         left.add_to(p);
00408         right.add_to(p);
00409     }
00410 public:
00411     filter_node_join( filter_node& x, filter_node& y ) : left(x), right(y) {}
00412 };
00413 
00414 } // namespace internal
00416 
00417 template<typename T, typename U, typename Body>
00418 filter_t<T,U> make_filter(tbb::filter::mode mode, const Body& body) {
00419     return new internal::filter_node_leaf<T,U,Body>(mode, body);
00420 }
00421 
00422 template<typename T, typename V, typename U>
00423 filter_t<T,U> operator& (const filter_t<T,V>& left, const filter_t<V,U>& right) {
00424     __TBB_ASSERT(left.root,"cannot use default-constructed filter_t as left argument of '&'");
00425     __TBB_ASSERT(right.root,"cannot use default-constructed filter_t as right argument of '&'");
00426     return new internal::filter_node_join(*left.root,*right.root);
00427 }
00428 
00430 template<typename T, typename U>
00431 class filter_t {
00432     typedef internal::filter_node filter_node;
00433     filter_node* root;
00434     filter_t( filter_node* root_ ) : root(root_) {
00435         root->add_ref();
00436     }
00437     friend class internal::pipeline_proxy;
00438     template<typename T_, typename U_, typename Body>
00439     friend filter_t<T_,U_> make_filter(tbb::filter::mode, const Body& );
00440     template<typename T_, typename V_, typename U_>
00441     friend filter_t<T_,U_> operator& (const filter_t<T_,V_>& , const filter_t<V_,U_>& );
00442 public:
00443     filter_t() : root(NULL) {}
00444     filter_t( const filter_t<T,U>& rhs ) : root(rhs.root) {
00445         if( root ) root->add_ref();
00446     }
00447     void operator=( const filter_t<T,U>& rhs ) {
00448         filter_node* old = root;
00449         root = rhs.root; 
00450         if( root ) root->add_ref();
00451         if( old ) old->remove_ref();
00452     }
00453     ~filter_t() {
00454         if( root ) root->remove_ref();
00455     }
00456     void clear() {
00457         // Like operator= with filter_t() on right side.
00458         if( root ) {
00459             filter_node* old = root;
00460             root = NULL;
00461             old->remove_ref();
00462         }
00463     }
00464 };
00465 
00466 inline internal::pipeline_proxy::pipeline_proxy( const filter_t<void,void>& filter_chain ) : my_pipe() {
00467     __TBB_ASSERT( filter_chain.root, "cannot apply parallel_pipeline to default-constructed filter_t"  );
00468     filter_chain.root->add_to(my_pipe);
00469 }
00470 
00471 inline void parallel_pipeline(size_t max_number_of_live_tokens, const filter_t<void,void>& filter_chain
00472 #if __TBB_TASK_GROUP_CONTEXT
00473     , tbb::task_group_context& context
00474 #endif
00475     ) {
00476     internal::pipeline_proxy pipe(filter_chain);
00477     // tbb::pipeline::run() is called via the proxy
00478     pipe->run(max_number_of_live_tokens
00479 #if __TBB_TASK_GROUP_CONTEXT
00480               , context
00481 #endif
00482     );
00483 }
00484 
00485 #if __TBB_TASK_GROUP_CONTEXT
00486 inline void parallel_pipeline(size_t max_number_of_live_tokens, const filter_t<void,void>& filter_chain) {
00487     tbb::task_group_context context;
00488     parallel_pipeline(max_number_of_live_tokens, filter_chain, context);
00489 }
00490 #endif // __TBB_TASK_GROUP_CONTEXT
